title: Will Bigger, Bolder Lidl-Trek and Bora-Hansgrohe Break Down the Grand Tour Hierarchy in 2024?
content:
Face off: Roglič and Geoghegan Hart headline newly ambitious squads in 2024 – but can they displace Visma and UAE?

Read the full article at Will Bigger, Bolder Lidl-Trek and Bora-Hansgrohe Break Down the Grand Tour Hierarchy in 2024? on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
